title: Estimate the number of unique values
sql:
select count ( * ) from t;

  COUNT(*)
 128000000

select approx_count_distinct ( c2 ) from t;

APPROX_COUNT_DISTINCT(C2)
                   430425

Elapsed: 00:00:08.98

select count ( distinct c2 ) from t;

COUNT(DISTINCTC2)
           445425

Elapsed: 00:00:13.69

selection.hint: Within 96.6% of the true value but 35% faster!
